history.proof: intros x. unfold continuity_pt. intros eps. simpl. exists eps. split. - qsimpl use: cond_pos. - intros y Hy. qsimpl use: cond_pos,Rminus_0_r.

exceptions.exn: In environment x, eps : R H : eps > 0 Unable to unify "0 < ?M2371" with "0 < eps".
The LHS of Rminus_0_r (_ - 0) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros x. unfold continuity_pt. intros eps. unfold locally'. simpl. exists eps. split. - apply cond_pos. - intros y Hy. unfold Rabs. simpl. unfold minus. rewrite Rminus_0_r. apply Hy.
